channel.title: [PI] Problems with teleporting on webclient
channel.description:
Hi,
When in my server a object or anything really teleports you to a place with an height higher or lower than 0 the client will freeze up. I don't know what to do about it (also the ::tele option makes you freeze if you teleport to a <0 or >0 position)
Any ideas on how to fix it?

item.title: [PI] Problems with teleporting on webclient
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

It’s because the client packets need to be configured to work with the server packets.

Read full topic
